pricingNote: Pricing varies by consultant focus and session length. Prices shown are from.

services.name: Reset Massage
services.outcome: A full-body reset focused on tension release and calm.

services.name: Deep Tissue Recovery
services.outcome: Focused pressure to release stubborn knots and tension.
prepNotes: Let us know any injuries or areas to avoid.
afterCare: Drink extra water to support recovery.

services.name: Assisted Stretch + Flow
services.outcome: Improved mobility and eased tension through guided stretches.
prepNotes: Wear comfortable clothing for ease of movement.
afterCare: Repeat key stretches at home for best results.

services.name: Lymphatic Drain Ritual
services.outcome: Light pressure to support circulation and reduce puffiness.
prepNotes: Avoid heavy meals right before your session.
afterCare: Plan a low-key day to maintain the reset.

services.name: Aroma Restore Ritual
services.outcome: A calming ritual that balances body and mind.
afterCare: Give yourself 10 minutes to ease back into the day.

services.name: Sound + Breath Reset
services.outcome: A nervous-system reset using breath, sound, and gentle touch.
prepNotes: Arrive a few minutes early to settle in.
afterCare: Journal or hydrate to extend the calm.
